title: Idea on preventing fishy links
body:
So I've been wondering and came up of a rough idea to prevent fishy links throughout the league community:

The idea is that a summoner who has come upon a fishy link that probably says "Free Rp" or something, so that summoner proceeds to submit it to a league data base where it is registered as "Unsafe link".

So if the link appears or maybe similar link appears in any of the league chat logs it would automatically block or remove the text and put the summoner (place of origin of the link).

This is a rough draft but any idea would be appreciate to help improve the effectiveness of this idea that maybe could be implemented,
